name: SPECIAL -- BUY 1 GET 2 FREE -- PDF TUTORIAL BUNDLE -- (59 Dollar Value)
description:
Are you a fan of Scrabble tile pendants, but looking for something NEW and DIFFERENT? 

After much anticipation, (and many late nights leading up to this launch :)) my newest ScrabbleGal product is finally available – and it’s like nothing you’ve seen before…

SCRABBLE IN STYLE: 77 Fun & Fresh Scrabble Tile Projects! 

This Jam-Packed Full-Color PDF Guide (40+ pages!) goes WAY beyond the classic Scrabble tile pendant. In this guide, you’ll discover everything you want to know about Scrabble tile crafting, including:

- 8 Basic Technique Mini-Tutorials
- 13 Ways to Make Scrabble Tile Jewelry
- 65 Instructional Diagrams & Photos
- 4 Funky Finishes
- 4 Ways to Jazz up Your Tiles
- 6 Scrabble Tile Alternatives
- And Much Much More!!!

Still not sure? 

Well, when you order SCRABBLE IN STYLE today, I’m also going to include for you My Original Scrabble Tile Tutorial AND My Custom Photo Tutorial – absolutely FREE! 

These products currently individually sell in my shop for $17 & $18 each! Just check out my product pages for more details…

Finally, you should know that you are 100% free to create any of the Scrabble tile projects outlined in SCRABBLE IN STYLE and even sell them provided they are made by you. However, you MAY NOT use my personal images and copyright protected text. 

SCRABBLE IN STYLE – vol. I (along with your bonuses) will be emailed to your email account within 24 hours of receiving payment. 

All E-Books and Tutorials by The Scrabble Gal are copyright protected. Tutorials may not be sold, copied or forwarded without written permission.

name: Make Your Own Custom Photo Jewelry -- PDF TUTORIAL
description:
Learn how to make your own personalized jewelry with your favorite photos! 

My full-color, step-by-step tutorial “How To Make Your Own Custom Photo Jewelry” teaches you everything you need to know to make your very own gorgeous photo jewelry using craft or Scrabble tiles. I guide you through the entire process including photo editing so that you can make the most of your photos!

You will receive a full-color electronic PDF containing the all of following:

20 Full-Color instructional photos 
A Complete List of Materials (by the way, everything is non-toxic) 
Shortcut Secrets
Answers to the Most Frequently Asked Questions 
Troubleshooting Tips 

My personal email address - just in case you run into any questions along the way, or simply want to share photos of your finished product! 

And as a bonus, I’ll even divulge my tightly guarded Personal List of Online Source of Materials, so you know exactly where to find everything.

Custom photo jewelry is great for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, graduation and just about any other celebration. Make something unique! :) 

Tutorial will be emailed to your email account within 24 hours of purchase.

name: Original Scrabble Tile Jewelry Tutorial
description:
You've seen them all over, now learn how to make them yourself! 

If you’ve got $20 to invest in materials and 2 hours of spare time, you can learn to make these gorgeous little jewelry tiles. 

My full-color, step-by-step tutorial “How To Make Beautiful Scrabble Tile Jewelry” teaches you everything you need to know to make your very own gorgeous Scrabble tile jewelry.

You will receive a full-color electronic PDF containing the all of following:

17 Full-Color instructional photos 
My 8 Shortcut Secrets 
Complete List of Materials (by the way, everything is non-toxic) 
Answers to the 21 Most Frequently Asked Questions 
7 Troubleshooting Tips 

My personal email address - just in case you run into any questions along the way, or simply want to share photos of your finished product! 

And as a bonus, I’ll even divulge my tightly-guarded Personal List of Online Source of Materials, so you know exactly where to find everything.

Tutorial will be emailed to your email account within 24 hours of purchase.
